description: The Sawtooth X Low Waterproof has all the bells and whistles of the non-waterproof version, but with the added benefit of Oboz's B-DRY waterproof and breathable technology. While the new Sawtooth X has refined styling, it retains the Cordura vents that help promote breathability and make it recognizably a Sawtooth. But your feet will recognize it as a Sawtooth first and foremost.
name: Oboz Sawtooth X Low B-Dry, Wide - Mens

specs.value: Oiled nubuck, Cordura Fabric mesh, TPU heel counter, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, 100% RPET Repreve Laces, 100% RPET Repreve Webbing, Micro-injected PU window underlay
Rubber-blended adaptive foam, TPU Shank, Heel puck
